rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0001
rows.name: So, Rex, you lived here?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0002
rows.name:
Huh? No, this was my getaway.
You know, like a secret hideout.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0003
rows.name:
I lived on Gramps.
I'd moor him next to
that cliff over the way.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0004
rows.name: What kind of kid were you, Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0005
rows.name: I dunno. I've not really thought about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0006
rows.name: I bet you're curious too, right Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0007
rows.name: Oh, er, well, maybe a bit.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0008
rows.name:
I could tell you a few stories about
when Rex was younger.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0009
rows.name:
Ah yes... He was a wild child, that's
for sure. A bit of a tearaway.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0010
rows.name:
He was never the biggest child, but he
had a strong sense of justice. Always
picking fights with the local bullies!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0011
rows.name: I think I still have the bumps to prove it.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0012
rows.name:
So he's been this full of energy his
whole life?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0013
rows.name: Sounds like you were a right handful!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0014
rows.name: My my, you certainly seem interested.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0015
rows.name:
Well then, perhaps I'll tell you
my best Rex story.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0016
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0017
rows.name: Whoa, wait just a sec!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0018
rows.name: Go on then. I've got nothing to hide!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0101
rows.name: What do you mean, "best"?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0102
rows.name:
One day, one of the local kids
was attacked by a monster.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0103
rows.name:
Without thinking, Rex jumped
in to help him.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0104
rows.name: That's our reckless Rex!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0105
rows.name:
That's your story?
Of course I'm gonna help someone
in danger!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0106
rows.name: What happened after that?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0107
rows.name:
Both Rex and the kid had to
be rescued by the villagers.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0108
rows.name:
Huh? Wasn't Rex meant to be
the one doing the rescuing?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0109
rows.name:
That was his plan. Unfortunately, he
just ended up in the same hot water.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0110
rows.name: Hah. Rex, you genius.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0111
rows.name:
That night, I heard Rex
bawling his eyes out.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0112
rows.name:
Was he was in pain from his wounds,
I asked.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0113
rows.name:
But he replied "No, I just wish
I'd been able to save my friend."

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0114
rows.name:
Injury held no fear for him, but
the anguish of not being able to
save his friend was unbearable.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0115
rows.name: And he cried about that?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0116
rows.name:
What's the big deal?
Kids cry. It's normal!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0117
rows.name: No, Rex. Nia is impressed.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0118
rows.name: Aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0119
rows.name: Sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0120
rows.name:
I was surprised at your bravery.
Even at that age...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0121
rows.name: We admire you, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0122
rows.name: Aw, stoppit! You'll make me blush.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0123
rows.name:
Ho ho ho.
I told you it was a good story!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0201
rows.name: Gramps'll just exaggerate it anyway.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0202
rows.name:
So you won't mind me telling
them about the time you wet yourself
when there was a monster attack?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0203
rows.name:
Huh?
No, that's not-

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0204
rows.name: W-wet yourself?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0205
rows.name: Rex, you baby.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0206
rows.name:
That was just when I was a kid!
I don't do it anymore!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0207
rows.name:
Don't even think about carrying
on with the story, Gramps!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0208
rows.name: Aw, c'mon. We wanna hear!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0209
rows.name:
No!
Homura, please... You don't want to hear
it, do you?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0210
rows.name:
Um...
Actually, I kind of do.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0211
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0212
rows.name:
This is a story about the time one of
the local bullies fell foul of a monster.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0213
rows.name: Rex didn't hesitate. He packed up and...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0214
rows.name: Gramps, please stop!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0215
rows.name:
Is wetting yourself really that
embarrassing?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0216
rows.name:
Super embarrassing! Nia, don't tell me
it's never happened to you!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0218
rows.name: Maybe we should hear a different story.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0219
rows.name:
Oho, you'd like to hear an even
more embarrassing story?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0220
rows.name:
No! Stop!
Don't encourage him, Homura!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0221
rows.name:
Huh? I just want to know as
much about you as possible, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0222
rows.name:
Well said.
Drivers and Blades should know
everything about each other.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0223
rows.name:
Yeah, well, there's everything
and there's EVERYTHING.
Can we please just drop it?
